channel.title: Balaji Venkat Sathia Narayanan - Balaji Venkat Sathia Narayanan

item.title: Research diaries - A search for supersymmetry using data from the LHC
item.description: My PhD research work on searching for SUSY using data from the CMS detector in LHC. The search was performed in a phase space that contains events containing two opposite sign same flavor leptons. Though supersymmetry was not found, the results were used to improve existing lower-bounds for the masses of the undiscovered supersymmetric particles
item.dc:creator: Balaji Venkat Sathia Narayanan
